thi-ap1:8.3: Sattaratanamahesī → sattaratanassa mahesī (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap1:9.1: Idha sañcitakusalā → tattha sañcitaṃ kusalaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | idha sañcitā kusalaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap1:21.2: Tammūlaṃ sāsane khamaṃ → tammūlaṃ sā ca sāsane khanti (bj, mr) | taṃ mūlaṃ sā ca sāsane khanti (pts-vp-pli1ed)
